responsibilities: Developed and maintained production-grade web apps using Vue.js, Nuxt.js, and later transitioned to React.js and Next.js.
Led frontend experiments through A/B testing and rapid iteration cycles to improve conversion and UX.
Implemented SEO, SSR, and scalable routing using the Next.js App Router.
Built full-stack features by integrating APIs with Node.js, Express, Firebase, and Supabase.
Collaborated closely with cross-functional teams in Agile sprints using GitLab and GitHub.
Assisted in refactoring and maintaining internal web tools for operational workflows.
Gained hands-on experience with Git, JavaScript, and responsive frontend development.
